scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && astro check && astro build
scripts.build:wasm: pnpm run rustup && pnpm run build:rustbik && pnpm run link:rustbik
scripts.dev:wasm: cd rustbik && cargo watch -i dist -- wasm-pack build --out-dir dist -- --features debug
scripts.rustup: rustup update stable && rustup default stable
scripts.build:rustbik: wasm-pack build rustbik --out-dir dist && pnpm link ./rustbik/dist
